value.stringValue: Please send invoice to the following customer based on information below
Requested Invoice by email to eval team

decisions.name: check_if_city_and_state_fields_are_not_null
decisions.label: check if city and state fields are not null

decisions.name: Make_Sure_there_is_a_sku
decisions.label: Make Sure there is a sku

fields.name: Confirm1
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation Page
Please Confirm All information is correct. After clicking the next button on this screen, the email quote PDF will be sent to your billing contact listed.

fields.name: ConfirmationPage
fields.fieldText:
Billing Company: {!billcompany}
Billing Street: {!billstreet}
Billling City: {!billcity}
Billing State: {!billstate}
Billing Zip: {!billzip}
Billing Contact Name: {!billconname}
Billing Contact Phone: {!billconphone}
Billing Contact: Email {!billconemail}
Products: {!Productsunits}
Serial Numbers: {!serialnumbers}
Eval Prices: {!EvalPrice}
Tax Rate: {!taxrate}
Recycle Fees: {!recyclecol}
Total Cost: {!TotalCostUnits}

fields.name: Instructions
fields.fieldText:
The Shipping information from Oracle did not come through. Please enter the shipping information below.
Thanks

validationRule.errorMessage: Please use 2 digit code for state

fields.name: ShippingSpecialIn
fields.fieldText:
Below is the shipping contact information and the special instructions. Please use the address that the unit was actually shipped to.
{!ShippingAdd}
{!SpecialInst}

fields.name: SampleSku
fields.fieldText:
We cannot create a quote because there is a product that does not exists in salesforce.
It may be because it is a sample product. SFDC admin has been notfied and will contact you and let you know the next course of action.
Thanks

textTemplates.name: Confirmation
textTemplates.text:
Please Confirm that all information below is correct before clicking next. This is the final step.
You can go back in the browser to update any information.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody1
textTemplates.text: Please send an invoice for RMA # {!RMA} and Eval Request Number text({!evalname})

textTemplates.name: errorbody
textTemplates.text:
there is a missing sku and it caused an error on the quote
http://viewsonic.my.salesforce.com/{!eval}

textTemplates.name: Errorsub
textTemplates.text: Error on Quote Request. There is a product without a sku.

textTemplates.name: Subject
textTemplates.text: Please send an invoice for RMA # {!RMA} and Eval Request Number {!evalname}

textTemplates.name: test
textTemplates.text:
Billing Information for Evaluation Product(s) Quote
 
Company Name : &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_COMPANY_NAME Account Number :  
Bill to Address : &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_STREET_QUOTE Sales Order/RMA : &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_RMA
&=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_CITY_QUOTE, &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_STATE_QUOTE  Purchase Order :  
Contact Name : &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_CONTACT_NAME_NAME Quote Date : 10/30/16
Name on Card :   Payment Term :  
Credit Card No:   Phone Number : &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE
Credit Card Type:  
Exp. Date :  
Contact Email : &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL_INVOICE
         
PART NUMBER/ITEM Serial Number QTY UNIT PRICE TOTAL
&=QueryData.SKU_NAME &=QueryData.EVAL_UNIT_DETAILS_NAME &=&=1  &=QueryData.EVAL_UNIT_DETAILS_EVALUATION_PRICE   &=QueryData.EVAL_UNIT_DETAILS_EVALUATION_PRICE 
  Tax exemption letter or resale certificate is required to the exempt tax    Tax & Recycle Fees    (if applicable): #VALUE!
      Tax Rate &=Master.EVAL_REQUEST_SALES_TAX_RATE
      Shipping:  $-  
      TOTAL: #VALUE!
Payment Method:  Credit Card or Check
**If paying by credit card please fill out all highlighted in yellow required fields 
Fax the completed form to 909-444-5623 
Note:  This is a secured fax number which only authorized personnel is allowed access
If paying by check please attach this document with the check
 
** This invoice is only good for 10 days from the date the invoice is issued.  
** The payment can be either by check or credit card.
Customer Signature     Date:  
Print Name:
